Report generated: 2025-12-01 03:54:47

======================================================================
Test Case 3 (2D): The 'Quadratic Decay'
======================================================================

Isotropic diffusion with forcing and Robin BCs.
Exact solution: u = exp(-t) * (1 + x^2 + y^2)
Forcing: F = -exp(-t) * (5 + x^2 + y^2)
Robin BC: u + du/dn = g (alpha=1, beta=1)
Time range: t in [0, 2]

======================================================================
SPATIAL CONVERGENCE STUDY
======================================================================
  Grid  11^2: dx = 0.100000, L-inf error = 4.960068e-02, L2 error = 3.437706e-02
  Grid  21^2: dx = 0.050000, L-inf error = 2.440432e-02, L2 error = 1.614605e-02
  Grid  41^2: dx = 0.025000, L-inf error = 1.252177e-02, L2 error = 8.082507e-03
  Grid  81^2: dx = 0.012500, L-inf error = 6.754961e-03, L2 error = 4.309091e-03
  Grid 161^2: dx = 0.006250, L-inf error = 3.914349e-03, L2 error = 2.488109e-03
